emailData.subject: Testing
emailData.content:
Cold Email Template

Dear [Recipient Name],

I hope this email finds you well. I came across your profile and was impressed by your work in [their field/company].

I believe there might be a great opportunity for collaboration between us. [Your value proposition or specific reason for reaching out].

Would you be interested in a brief 15-minute call to discuss how we could potentially work together?

Looking forward to hearing from you.

Best regards,
[Your Name]
[Your Company]
[Your Contact Information]

emailData.subject: Cut Dev Costs by 70%—Without Hiring a Single Developer
emailData.content:
From Costly to Cost-Smart
Your Dev Team Is Waiting
No hiring headaches. No missed deadlines. Just top-tier tech talent at a fraction of the cost.
Hi Michael,

I was really impressed by Ascendant Technologies' 30+ years of serving the Tri-State area with expert managed IT, cybersecurity, cloud, and custom IT strategies. Your strength lies not just in your experience, but in your deeply personalized, 24/7 support and your ability to craft industry-specific solutions across sectors like healthcare, finance, manufacturing, and education.

I’m Bilal, CTO of Devdive, a fellow business owner leading a team that brings together eight years of experience in design, development, AI integration, cybersecurity, and deployment—all delivered with attention to quality, scalability, and efficiency. We help agencies avoid the cost and headaches of hiring—making top-tier tech talent instantly accessible, without skyrocketing budgets. No hiring headaches. No missed deadlines. Just results—at a fraction of the cost.

Partnering with DevDive means you can:
  • Deliver high-quality client portals, automation tools, analytics dashboards, or mobile apps—without recruiting or training new staff
  • Seamlessly integrate AI-powered insights, CRM enhancements, or workflow automation into your managed services offerings
  • Support overflow during peak demand, urgent client projects, or new service launches while your core team focuses on operations
  • Provide expert development support on demand, preserving your reputation for reliability and responsiveness
If you're open to a quick 10-minute call, I’d love to explore how DevDive can align with your vision and help you scale even smarter. Even if now isn’t the right time, I’d still welcome a connection—businesses grow through relationships, shared ideas, and mutual trust.
Looking forward to connecting.
Best regards,
Bilal Shahid
Co-Founder & CTO
bilal@devdive.net
Devdive
